attributes.action: Don't abolish the BBC licence fee.
attributes.additional_details: Have a debate and initiate a public consultation on the issue.
attributes.background: The BBC is a public service and very good value for money. It is also one of the best broadcasters in the world. This government wants to destroy it by abolishing the licence fee. We want to stop this.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/606445
